schema.title: StimulationJob
schema.description: Parent object for all the information for one Frac / Stimulation Job within a Well/Wellbore. A Stimulation Job can be associated to one or more Stimulation Stages with each Stage having one or more Job Steps.

id.description: Previously called ResourceID or SRN which identifies this OSDU resource object without version.
id.title: Entity ID

kind.description: The schema identification for the OSDU resource object following the pattern {Namespace}:{Source}:{Type}:{VersionMajor}.{VersionMinor}.{VersionPatch}. The versioning scheme follows the semantic versioning, https://semver.org/.
kind.title: Entity Kind

version.description: The version number of this OSDU resource; set by the framework.
version.title: Version Number

acl.description: The access control tags associated with this entity.
acl.title: Access Control List

legal.description: The entity's legal tags and compliance status. The actual contents associated with the legal tags is managed by the Compliance Service.
legal.title: Legal Tags

tags.title: Tag Dictionary
tags.description: A generic dictionary of string keys mapping to string value. Only strings are permitted as keys and values.

createTime.description: Timestamp of the time at which initial version of this OSDU resource object was created. Set by the System. The value is a combined date-time string in ISO-8601 given in UTC.
createTime.title: Resource Object Creation DateTime

createUser.title: Resource Object Creation User Reference
createUser.description: The user reference, which created the first version of this resource object. Set by the System.

modifyTime.description: Timestamp of the time at which this version of the OSDU resource object was created. Set by the System. The value is a combined date-time string in ISO-8601 given in UTC.
modifyTime.title: Resource Object Version Creation DateTime

modifyUser.title: Resource Object Version Creation User Reference
modifyUser.description: The user reference, which created this version of this resource object. Set by the System.

ancestry.description: The links to data, which constitute the inputs, from which this record instance is derived.
ancestry.title: Ancestry

meta.description: The Frame of Reference meta data section linking the named properties to self-contained definitions.
meta.title: Frame of Reference Meta Data

WellboreID.title: Wellbore ID
WellboreID.description: A link to the wellbore in which the stimulation took place.

WellActivityID.title: Well Activity ID
WellActivityID.description: A link to the well activity to which this stimulation job is associated.

VerticalMeasurement.title: Depth Reference Elevation
VerticalMeasurement.description: ID to the Zero Depth Point Vertical Measure elevation for depths contained in the stimulation job, job stages and other objects used to correlate MDs to original drilling rig MD. References an entry in the Vertical Measurement array for the Well parented by the wellbore via WellboreID.

WellboreTubularID.title: Tubular Assembly
WellboreTubularID.description: Installed tubular through which the stimulation job is performed.

HoleSectionID.title: Hole Section Identifier
HoleSectionID.description: Hole Section stimulation job performed in.

JobTypeID.title: Job Type ID
JobTypeID.description: Identifier of the type of well stimulation job

JobStartDateTime.title: Job Start Date Time
JobStartDateTime.description: Start date and time of the stimulation job.

JobEndDateTime.title: Job End Date Time
JobEndDateTime.description: Ending date and time of the stimulation job.

ArrivalDateTime.title: Arrival Date Time
ArrivalDateTime.description: Date and time at which the stimulation contractor arrives on location.

MaterialCatalog.title: Material Catalog
MaterialCatalog.description: Object that contains the Additives and Proppants on location and used in the stimulation job.

items.title: Material Catalogue
items.description: Object that defines the additives and proppants on location and used in the stimulation job.

Additives.title: Additives
Additives.description: Define the additives on location and used in the stimulation job.

ProppantAgents.title: Proppant Agents
ProppantAgents.description: Define the proppants on location and used in the stimulation job.

BHStaticTemperature.title: BH Static Temperature
BHStaticTemperature.description: Bottomhole static temperature for the job (BHST)

BHTreatingTemperature.title: BH Treating Temperature
BHTreatingTemperature.description: Expected or calculated bottomhole treating temperature for the job.

ContractorID.title: Contractor ID
ContractorID.description: Identifier of service company performing the stimulation job.

FlowBackPressure.title: Flow Back Pressure
FlowBackPressure.description: Pressure recorded on fluid returning to surface.

FlowBackRate.title: Flow Back Rate
FlowBackRate.description: Flow rate recorded on fluid returning to surface.

FlowBackVolume.title: Flow Back Volume
FlowBackVolume.description: Volume recorded on fluid returning to surface.

FluidEfficiency.title: Fluid Efficiency
FluidEfficiency.description: Volume ratio of fluid in the fracture at the end of pumping.

FluidPumpingRateMax.title: Fluid Pumping Rate Max
FluidPumpingRateMax.description: Maximum job fluid pumping rate encountered during treatment of all stages.

HhpOrdered.title: HHP Ordered
HhpOrdered.description: Hydraulic horsepower ordered for the stimulation job.

HhpUsed.title: HHP Used
HhpUsed.description: Hydraulic horsepower actually used for the stimulation job.

JobPressureMax.title: Job Pressure Max
JobPressureMax.description: Maximum pressure encountered during the job.

JobPressureAvg.title: Job Pressure Average
JobPressureAvg.description: Average pressure encountered during treatment of all stages.

JobTotalVolume.title: Job Total Volume
JobTotalVolume.description: Total volume pumped for all stages.

OperatorRepresentativeRemarks.title: Operator Representative Remarks
OperatorRepresentativeRemarks.example: Well is ready for CT ops once Frac ops completed and stimulation services are R/O

PIDXCommodityCodeID.title: PIDX Commodity Code ID
PIDXCommodityCodeID.description: Petroleum Industry Data Exchange (PIDX) UNSPSC (Segment 71) commodity code from the oil and gas extraction and production enhancement services family.

ProppantInFormationTotal.title: Proppant In Formation Total
ProppantInFormationTotal.description: The total mass of proppant placed in the formation for the entire stim job.

ProppantUsedTotal.title: Proppant Used Total
ProppantUsedTotal.description: The total mass of proppant used (pumped) for the entire stim job.

PumpTimeTotal.title: Pump Time Total
PumpTimeTotal.description: The total pumping time/duration for the entire stim job.

StageCount.title: Stage Count
StageCount.description: Integer Number of stages treated during the stimulation job.

Supervisor.title: Supervisor
Supervisor.description: Name of the service company supervisor.

MaterialUsed.title: Material Used
MaterialUsed.description: Total amount of materials used for the Stimulation Job.

WaterSource.title: Water Source
WaterSource.description: Source for water used during the stim job.

WaterManagementPlanIdentifier.title: Water Management Plan Identifier
WaterManagementPlanIdentifier.description: Water management plan identifier for this stim job.

OpenHoleLength.title: Open Hole Length
OpenHoleLength.description: Total length of stimulated interval for this stim job.

PadPercent.title: Pad Percent
PadPercent.description: The ratio of proppant placed in formation vs proppant pumped

IsCoiledTubingConveyed.title: Is Coiled Tubing Conveyed
IsCoiledTubingConveyed.description: Is the stimulation conveyed via coiled tubing?

CleanTotalVolume.title: Clean Total Volume
CleanTotalVolume.description: Total clean volume pumped for all job stages during this stim job.  Clean volume is amount of fluid before proppant is added.

WellLog.title: Well Log
WellLog.description: Log(s) associated to the Stim Job e.g. Composite Log(s)

Remarks.title: Remarks
Remarks.description: General remarks about this Stim Job.
